name: Sword & Slime 2D
description:
Slay the Slime with your sword and collect coins in this 2D platformer prototype.

My first game development project, made in Godot 3.0.6. All game assets made by other artists and available online for free. 

Source code here.

Controls

  • Movement - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Slash - L/R Mouse / J & K
  • Dash - Shift

Credits
